product.name: Cyberpunk 2077
product.shortDescription: Open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification...
product.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.
